snippet: Farhan Zaidi spent 10 years in Oakland, where he earned the admiration of General Manager Billy Beane. With the Dodgers, who hired Zaidi this month as general manager, he will have vast resources to exploit.
abstract: Profile of Farhan Zaidi, Los Angeles Dodgers' new general manager, who fell in love with baseball and learned how to play it while growing up in the Philippines.
lead_paragraph: Farhan Zaidi spent 10 years in Oakland, where he earned the admiration of General Manager Billy Beane. With the Dodgers, who hired Zaidi this month as general manager, he will have vast resources to exploit.

headline.seo: For Dodgers G.M. Farhan Zaidi, New Team Affords New Possibilities
headline.main: Inheriting a Payroll of Rich Possibilities
headline.print_headline: A Love of the Game, Honed Across the Globe
